intro.name: Arun Agarwal
intro.shortDesc: I build things for the web.
intro.longDesc: I'm an Engineering student who has a passion for software engineering and specializes in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm an engineering Intern at Highradius focused on building accessible, human-centered products.

aboutMe.aboutMeDescription: Lover of innovation and everything related to generating new knowledge. Face problems with a smile and solve them as soon as possible. Very calculated about the time I spend and the work I do.
aboutMe.workShorDesc: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

projects.name: Scrape to XLSX
projects.desc: A SpringBoot powered project to scrape data from interviewBit and save the data to a xlsx.We can also customise the search term for the data to be scraped

projects.name: Movie Streaming Site
projects.desc: A React based project to stream movies online with real-time data (Got the data from a pirate site by scraping it in fixed intervals)

projects.name: Leetcode Tracker
projects.desc: A SpringBoot powered project to scrape data from Blind 75 website and save the data to database. Display the data in a react based UI which helps to keep track of the questions solved

projects.name: Leetcode Tracker
projects.desc: A SpringBoot powered project to scrape data from Blind 75 website and save the data to database. Display the data in a react based UI which helps to keep track of the questions solved

orgs.label: Adidas Pvt. Ltd.
list: Working with a team of aspiring Engineers
Created many website layouts for clients eg. Coffe shop and Yoga Instructor
It was my first internship here I learnt how to use HTML and CSS in real world.
I was awarded with a letter of recommendation for good performance in intern period

orgs.label: Publicis Sapient Pvt. Ltd.
list: Worked in a team of 15 members to create a new website for the customer based on HTML 5, Vanilla javscript, Handlebars, SASS, Sightly and AEM.

orgs.label: Nagarro Softwares Pvt. Ltd.
list: Worked with a very supportive team on Machine Learning, Data Science, Java and React.
Created a machine learning model for internal working of the company.
Created backend with java and J2EE for using the predictions in the real world.
Created front end of the application with ReactJs and Material UI and connected the ML model with flask and java backend and made it fully functional app.
